{3}: Place a creature from your hand onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 servant creature.
{2}{U}: Level 2
When a face down creature you control is targeted by a source you don’t control return it to your hand.
{U}: Level 3
{2}: Turn a face down servant you control face up.
